# Setup

## Load R libraries
```{r load_libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(biomaRt)
library(data.table)
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
ensembl = useMart("ensembl", dataset = "hsapiens_gene_ensembl")

mito_genes <- getBM(attributes = c("ensembl_gene_id", "hgnc_symbol"),
                    filters = "chromosome_name",
                    values = "MT",
                    mart = ensembl)

dim(mito_genes)
mito_genes[1:2,]

fwrite(mito_genes, file="../Annotation/mito_genes.tsv", sep="\t")
```
